SERVICES.DESC: Get involved in projects with a social purpose. One of our main goal is to realise projects with a social responsibility background.

NEXT_DESTINATION.DESC: We already have a place in Hossegor, on the Landes coast, in Vienna, the Austrian capital, in Medellin, in Rio and two in Paris – but the MyWay adventure has only just begun. From the beating heart of the biggest cities to the most idyllic hideaways, we’ve designed the best trips for you across the world.

SLEEP_AT_MYWAY.DESC: One of the hottest areas currently in the world of crowdfunding is real estate. A swiss study found that the growth in crowdinvesting there was driven principally by real estate crowdinvesting. This segment, which emerged in Switzerland only in 2015, had by 2016 already reached 32.4 million swiss francs in funds raised.

THE_PLACE_FOR_GOOD_FOOD.DESC: As we live in a world driven by ideas and innovations, the need for platforms that accelerate the growth of new ventures has become increasingly crucial. Innovation crowdfunding company are emerging as a game-changer by offering a collaborative space for visionary individuals to bring their ideas to life.

DESC.1: We invite you to a new world of financial investments where projects are trackable and tangible.
DESC.2: It has been set up to provide you professional support for any investment inquiries you might have.
DESC.3: On our website the investment process is easy, fast and transparent.
